name: Abducted
description:
Single Channel Video Art
2015.

The human being as being abducted by technology, seduction and the subliminal prison that it represents, which keeps MAN in a technological cell. How every day we are more prisoners of technology and consumerism, proliferating materialism, the alert based on care so that it does not become our life, but in part ...

This video art is constructed from photographs, photo-performance, animated using the stop-motion technique and audio excerpts from video calls.

This video art has been part of many group exhibitions such as:

- Frágil Collective Exhibition, Arte Soy Gallery, Santiago de Cuba, December 2015
- Collective Exhibition Pretexts, Cultural Property Fund, Holguín, 2016
- International Salon of the Caribbean, Francisco Prag Puig Gallery, Santiago de Cuba, July 2017
- Processing Collective Exhibition, Center for the Development of Visual Arts, Havana, August 2018
